001
002package com.commercetools.http.javanet;
003
004/**
005 * Exception which is thrown by {@link CtJavaNetHttpClient}.
006 *
007 * <p>Typical problems are timeouts, connection problems and problems with the DNS configuration.</p>
008 */
009public class HttpException extends RuntimeException {
010    private static final long serialVersionUID = 0L;
011
012    public HttpException(final Throwable cause) {
013        super(cause);
014    }
015
016    public HttpException(final String message) {
017        super(message);
018    }
019
020    public HttpException(final String message, final Throwable cause) {
021        super(message, cause);
022    }
023
024}
